title: Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area: Weather
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Weather              Weather & River Conditions         A Storm Cloud Approaches Photo courtesy of National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA)   Weather Forecasts  At the northern end of the park: Milford, PA Forecast  In the middle of the park: Bushkill, PA Forecast  At the southern end of the park: Delaware Water Gap, PA Forecast   River Conditions  Delaware River Height at Montague, NJ Gauge  Delaware River Height at Tocks Island, NJ Gauge  Delaware River Temperature at Barryville, NY Gauge
